title.narrative: Nurturing Movement of Girls and Young Women as Agents of Change

description.narrative: The project aims to ensure that the young women who are victims/ vulnerable to child marriage and GBV, especially SRHR, effectively realize their rights.

participating-org.narrative: REACH - Rural Environmental Awareness Community Help
SEVAK - Society for Empowerment through Voluntary Action in Karnataka

description.narrative: Expenditure 2019
Expenditure 2020

title.narrative: Awareness on early marriages, early pregnancy and GBV to the community members

description.narrative: Awareness on early marriages, early pregnancy and GBV to the community members

title.narrative: # of community awareness raising campaigns conducted to promote child rights

description.narrative: # of community awareness raising campaigns conducted to promote child rights

comment.narrative: Previous quarter backlogs were completed during the quarter;
There are no campaigns planned during the quarter, due to COVID protocols. However, the awareness sessions were conducted with the movement members and their families;
Unable to conduct campaigns due to covid crisis;
Virtual awareness sessions were conducted on CR, health and GBV;

title.narrative: Conduct various studies and gather evidence to present the data to Government as part of advocacy

description.narrative: Conduct various studies and gather evidence to present the data to Government as part of advocacy

title.narrative: # of documents presented to government

description.narrative: # of documents presented to government

comment.narrative: One recommendation presented on the PCMA rules amendment. Research study is in process, which is not planned during the quarter and 75% of expenses utilised on Research during the quarter;
Overall, it was planned to present 1 document for child rights to government. However, due to the crisis situation, it will be done in next quarter;
Preparation of study is in process;
Sessions conducted and feedback document on PCMA rules presented to relevant department, which was not planned during the quarter;

title.narrative: Develop the married adolescent girls and survivors of early marriages to lead the movement and claim their rights

description.narrative: Develop the married adolescent girls and survivors of early marriages to lead the movement and claim their rights

title.narrative: # of children trained as agents of change

description.narrative: # of children trained as agents of change

comment.narrative: 28 girls identified and follow up training are given during the quarter. No new identification. Since most of the training are done virtually, the expenditure is less.;
Follow up events for the identified change agents, therefore the output indicator has no target and achievement. Previous quarter backlogs were completed during the quarter;
The trainings were provided virtually and reached more girls at reduced cost;
Trainings were provided virtually to the identified children. The target was planned during 4th quarter but achieved during the quarter, since we were able to reach out virtually;

title.narrative: Organise various events for community members to sensitise the issues of child marriages

description.narrative: Organise various events for community members to sensitise the issues of child marriages

title.narrative: # of child protection committees supported

description.narrative: # of child protection committees supported

comment.narrative: Due to Covid crisis, the incidence of child marriages has increased. The partners worked with the child protection committee closely to prevent the incidences;
During covid crisis, the child marriages are at rise. Though facilitated child protection committees on stopping child marriages, we were able to reach only 31 against the target;

During the quarter the child protection committees are revived in most of the villages and meetings were organised with the committee members, officials and community leaders, leads to utilisation increase. Also the previous quarter backlogs were completed during the quarter.;
Meeting the CPC was difficult due to the crisis, and few of them were reached by phone and provided support;
Previous quarter backlogs were completed during the quarter;

title.narrative: Organise various sessions to create awareness on the needs of early married girls

description.narrative: Organise various sessions to create awareness on the needs of early married girls

title.narrative: # of community members with exploited/abused children participated in awareness raising activities

description.narrative: # of community members with exploited/abused children participated in awareness raising activities

comment.narrative: During movement meetings virtually, the community members participated. However mobilising them was a difficult task due to covid crisis;
Meeting with the community was difficult due to the crisis, and few of them were reached by phone and provided support;

Mobilising the community members for mass event was not allowed. Therefore one to one and small gatherings were organised for the awareness raising sessions. Therefore the achievement is less than the target;
Most of the sessions were conducted virtually, so the expenditure is less.;
Previous quarter backlogs were completed during the quarter;

title.narrative: Organise various workshops for CSOs to ensure their support with movement activities

description.narrative: Organise various workshops for CSOs to ensure their support with movement activities

title.narrative: # of targeted national and regional CSOs attend network meeting for the promotion of child rights

description.narrative: # of targeted national and regional CSOs attend network meeting for the promotion of child rights

comment.narrative: CSOs were revived and meetings conducted in all the regions with the CSOs to retrieve their support to the project and stopping child marriages.;
Involved CSOs and meetings conducted at regional level in prevention of child marriages and promotion of child rights, though there is no plan during the quarter.;
Involved already enrolled CSOs in prevention of child marriages and other response activities;
It was planned to network with 50 CSOs during the year and reached 71 as on 3rd quarter.;
Virtual network meetings were conducted;

title.narrative: Sensitising married adolescent girls on the the issues concerning to their social protection , rights, services and opportunities

description.narrative: Sensitising married adolescent girls on the the issues concerning to their social protection , rights, services and opportunities

title.narrative: # of exploited/abused children participated in awareness raising sessions

description.narrative: # of exploited/abused children participated in awareness raising sessions

comment.narrative: Mobilising the girls into group was difficult due to COVID crisis. So there is less in number as per the plan;
Most of the sessions were conducted virtually, so the expenditure is less.;
Overall 4113 exploited girls participated in the awareness raising session.;
Previous quarter backlogs were completed during the quarter;
Various awarening programme were organised virtually and reached more EMGs during the quarter.;

title.narrative: Support to married adolescent girls and survivors of early marriages to enroll in the movement activities

description.narrative: Support to married adolescent girls and survivors of early marriages to enroll in the movement activities

title.narrative: # of girls immediately safeguarded

description.narrative: # of girls immediately safeguarded

comment.narrative: Limited access to meet the EMGs and survivors due to COVID crisis;
Movement members and leaders enrolled were encouraged to involve in movement activities and relief work;
Previous quarter backlogs were completed during the quarter;
The targeted Movement members enrolled in all the 5 regions;
Totally 10,204 girls are safeguarded by health services especially during COVID crisis. Therefore during the quarter it is less than the planned.;

title.narrative: Various awareness sessions to community members in collaboration with existing community based organisations

title.narrative: # of community members with children vulnerable to exploitation participated in awareness raising activities

description.narrative: # of community members with children vulnerable to exploitation participated in awareness raising activities

comment.narrative: Limited access to meeting the community members to conduct awareness session. However they were reached out through phone, virtual meetings;

Mobilising the community members for mass event was not allowed. Therefore one to one and small gatherings were organised for the awareness raising sessions. Therefore the achievement is less than the target;
Most of the sessions were conducted virtually, so the expenditure is less.;
Previous quarter backlogs were completed during the quarter;
The identified CSOs and CBOs were involved in providing awareness raising sessions;

description.narrative: # of community members participated in child protection committees

comment.narrative: Ensured the participation of few community members in the child protection committees during the prevention of child marriages. Due to Covid crisis unable to achieve as per the targets;
Previous quarter backlogs were completed during the quarter;
The champions from the community and movement have participated in the awareness and relief activities.;

title.narrative: # of government officials trained

description.narrative: # of government officials trained

comment.narrative: Govt officials were sensitised at the region level as part of advocacy.;
Limited possibilities to meet the government officials as all are busy with relief activities.;
Meeting with government officials was limited due to their priority of COVID crisis;
The discussions and trainings given on the support and protection measures required to EMGs and their families during Crisis;

title.narrative: # of inputs on child right policies and laws given to decision makers of government

description.narrative: # of inputs on child right policies and laws given to decision makers of government

comment.narrative: Consultation meetings conducted on PCMA rules and expenses for the preparation.;
Inputs on PCMA rules given to relevant department;
Meeting with government officials was limited due to their priority of COVID crisis;
Overall for the year, it was planned to give 2 inputs on CR and totally 11 was given on CR during crisis situation.;
